page.shortlink: dt db Clearing the Record Filter
page.description: This demonstration of Action Scripting adds a button to the Edit_Customer_Info form. This script will remove any restrictions to the records that the form displays.

step.description: Sketch a button on the form.
Select "Query" from the Category list and "Run Custom Query" from the Action list. Click OK.
Click Next >, Finish, Close (X), and Save All.

page.limitations: Desktop applications only. Not available in Community Edition.
